skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: An Imperial pegasus is a noble, winged steed, intelligent and loyal.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: Once trained to carry a man in battle, Imperial griffons are poised killers and incredibly dedicated to their riders.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: Dispatching regular delegations with gifts in hand will help to maintain good relations with our neighbours. Perhaps they may reciprocate this generosity.

As is typical of Halflings, Gideon is a short and good-natured fellow who serves as Wolfgang’s tutor and personal spymaster. His deep connections allow the young prince access to resources and allies that even the Emperor lacks.

effects.description: Immune to diplomatic penalties from trespassing

skillTree.localised_description: By the order of the Reiksmarshal, the Crown Prince must always be accompanied by the elite Reiksguard; his political influence over the Empire makes him a high-value target, just below the Emperor himself and his family.

effects.description:
Enables attribute "Glorious Charge" for all Knights
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

effects.description:
Enables attribute "Glorious Charge" for all Knights
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

skillTree.localised_description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.
This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
Wolfgang’s friendly demeanour and silver tongue have made him a popular man amongst both soldiers and civilians.
As Crown Prince of Reikland, Wolfgang has received training from the best and brightest minds of the Empire.

effects.description:
Character experience gain: +15%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.

skillTree.localised_description: Expert swordsmen, like the renowned Kurt Helborg and Ludwig Schwarzhelm, have trained the young prince in the strategies and intricacies of combat.
Being part of the ruling family in and of itself proffers great prestige and influence, bolstered by Wolfgang’s charisma and philanthropy.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +10 for Greatswords, Reiksguard & Demigryph Knights
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: If one is to become a great emperor, one cannot simply be a great warrior. Shrewd diplomacy and pragmatic deals are what pave the path to greatness.

Wolfgang often delivers passionate public speeches when Franz is preoccupied with other matters. He translates this same passion onto the battlefield, where fiery declarations and promises are shouted for all to hear.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

skillTree.localised_description: “Leaders alone don’t win battles, it's the men who fight in the front ranks that do. The least we can do is give them the highest quality gear we can forge.”

effects.description:
Weapon Strength: +5% for State Troops
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +6 for State Troops
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +9% for State Troops
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +12 for State Troops
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +14% for State Troops
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +18 for State Troops
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Wolfgang has created a small mounted detachment to ride out to nearby towns and villages to bring back fresh food, ensuring that the army is never left wanting on long campaigns.

effects.description:
Global recruitment duration: -1 turn for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Wolfgang has demonstrated his diplomatic guile, combat prowess and strategic intelligence, proving that he is indeed worthy of succeeding Karl Franz when the time comes.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: A veteran of countless battles, this one has a hunger for slaughter and a thirst for blood.
One doesn't reach the rank of General without having survived many a battle.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +20% for this Lord

skillTree.localised_description: The blades of the Empire slice through the enemy like so many knives through so much fleshy butter.
Courage, duty, honour – all meaningless without discipline. This commander demands their troops be perfectly drilled, that they may stand fast against even the darkest of the Empire's foes.
With their general at its head, the Empire's cavalry charge into battle with great zeal.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +10 for Cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Having friends in the high places of Imperial society has its benefits. It's always *who* you know...
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: “We march to war for our Emperor, and Sigmar, our saviour and lord.”

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, and Halberdiers units

Melee defence: +6 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: These steeds are bred for speed and war, but foremost it is their gallop which marks them out.

Charge bonus: +6 for Empire Knights, Reiksguard, Knights of the Black Rose and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord expects his men to practice the disciplines of the Pistolkorps, and all be expert marksmen.

skillTree.localised_description: Honest Empire-forged steel is all a state trooper could ask when confronting the myriad foes in battle.

skillTree.localised_description: Patrons of great forges and smiths expect, and are rewarded with, tougher and more enduring war machines.

skillTree.localised_description: Despite what the Dwarfs think, no other race can bring to bear such devastating artillery volleys.

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The frontline will either make or break you. Those who survive become the backbone of any army.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Halberdiers, Greatswords and Flagellants (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Armour: 10 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Halberdiers, Greatswords and Flagellants (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The veteran marksman knows the precise range required to land the killing shot.

Missile strength: +12% for Missile, Missile Cavalry and Missile Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Missile, Missile Cavalry and Missile Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Missile, Missile Cavalry and Missile Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Some men grow to relish war, dulled to the pain and living solely for the thrill of the kill.

Leadership: +5 for Empire Knight and Demigryph units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Empire Knight and Demigryph units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Empire Knight and Demigryph units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those in command of ordnance can potentially decide a battle before the melee has even begun.

Ammunition: +20% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, Marienburg Land Ship, Luminark of Hysh and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
Revered by the masses, such a celebrated leader will inspire many new recruits.
The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
It is said that Sigmar would bear a mortal wound and carry on fighting; this champion follows the hallowed Warrior-God.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.
Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: "Ever thought about joining the Elector's troops, chief? You'd make a good soldier alright."

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

items.colour_text: Forged by the greatest blacksmith in Altdorf, this sturdy sword is well-suited for the future Emperor.
A collection of pacts that binds our allies to come to our aid.
A lightweight, wide shield specially designed for mobility on the battlefield and Wolfgang’s shorter stature.

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

items.colour_text: An amulet that once belonged to Emperor Luitpold I, Franz’s predecessor, which holds great symbolic value, especially to Reiklanders.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

items.colour_text: A short and good-natured fellow who serves as Wolfgang’s tutor and personal spymaster. His deep connections on both sides of the law make him an indispensable member of the young Prince’s entourage.

effects.description: Immune to diplomatic penalties from trespassing

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Though he is only Franz’s nephew, the Emperor has decreed Prince Wolfgang his heir above his own young and inexperienced son, in light of Wolfgang’s great aptitude for statecraft and warfare.
